description: This file provides helper function declarations for interacting with sensor endpoints in a device management system. It includes functions to determine if a sensor endpoint is faulted or bypassed, either directly via endpoint data or through device service events.

methods.name: isEndpointFaulted
methods.description: Checks if the sensor endpoint is faulted based on its 'status' attribute.

methods.name: isEndpointFaultedViaEvent
methods.description: Determines if the sensor endpoint is faulted by analyzing a DeviceServiceResourceUpdatedEvent, specifically when the resource ID indicates sensor status.

methods.name: isEndpointBypassed
methods.description: Checks if the sensor endpoint is bypassed based on its 'bypassed' attribute.

methods.name: isEndpointBypassedViaEvent
methods.description: Determines if the sensor endpoint is bypassed via a DeviceServiceResourceUpdatedEvent, specifically when the resource ID indicates bypass status.
